title: 4-bit Latch Function Block
description:
FRMP_B calculates the value of a ramp at a given time TD. The module enï¿¾sures that no bufer overrun or underrun can take place at the output. The
output value is limited in all cases to 0 .. 255. TR sets the time for a full
ramp 0 .. 255 and TD is the elapsed time. If DIR = TRUE, a rising ramp is
calculated and if DIR = FALSE a falling edge. With the start value an edge
can be calculated from any starting point.
name: LTCH_4

input.name: D0
input.description: First data input for the latch.

input.name: D1
input.description: Second data input for the latch.

input.name: D2
input.description: Third data input for the latch.

input.name: D3
input.description: Fourth data input for the latch.

input.name: L
input.description: Control signal that determines if the latch is transparent.

input.name: RST
input.description: Asynchronous reset signal that resets the output.

output.name: Q0
output.description: Output corresponding to the first data input.

output.name: Q1
output.description: Output corresponding to the second data input.

output.name: Q2
output.description: Output corresponding to the third data input.

output.name: Q3
output.description: Output corresponding to the fourth data input.
